snippet: Gov. Jan Brewer stepped to the lectern under blazing sunshine and before a mostly friendly audience to introduce a Medicaid expansion bill she has championed.
abstract: Gov. Jan Brewer stepped to the lectern under blazing sunshine and before a mostly friendly audience to introduce a Medicaid expansion bill she has championed.

headline.main: Arizona Governor Introduces Bill to Expand Medicaid

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
